summary:
I am an International IT Recruiter working in the tech industry. 

I have experience hiring in Technology for all kinds of roles from A to Z and also in Travel with strong focus in the EMEA Region. 

Next to that I coach job-seekers and career-changers.

My goal is to make corporate HR better by educating job seekers and influencing organisations.

I designed and delivered a training program for hiring managers and leaders that empowered company founders to take recruitment in their own hands.', 'title': 'Hiring Consultant ', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 2586328, 'name': 'FASHIOLA', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQERXigQO3DWqA/company-logo_400_400/0/1654170291287?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=kk9qU_zPgwuFFhxp-4ndVcvzjegtTSUoZCyOHmabH4k', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/kleding-nl/', 'employees': {'start': 11, 'end': 50}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Amsterdam Area, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}}, 'company': 'FASHIOLA', 'description': 'By joining Fashiola I fulfilled my goal to work at a tech scale-up company and be responsible for all level roles. After I noticed that the internal and external stakeholder engagement needed a boost, I took the initiative to roll out new hiring processes for each role uniquely, as well as employer branding practises. I involved the hiring managers in this process and as a result their interest for interviewing and candidate engagement sparked. When I joined Fashiola no data was gathered for measuring the performance of recruitment efforts, so I implemented an ATS that provided better visibility to the hiring managers.', 'title': 'Recruitment Specialist', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 11348, 'name': 'Booking.com', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQEgzF5azm3fNA/company-logo_400_400/0/1628510256914?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=oaxCkHySuLgrEFLXxw_Q9XDv1cHJeWHoyplnre8Oexo', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/booking.com/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Amsterdam Area, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'company': 'Booking.com', 'description': 'My personal target when joining Booking.com was to move to recruitment. Due to my experience in the Customer Service department, I was able to help educate the Recruitment-team regarding the complex nature of the jobs we recruited for. I hired top candidates from different countries for the various customer service teams. The hires matched the culture and the job perfectly, which the feedback from several team leaders confirmed. With approximately 100 new hires, I reached my seasonal hiring targets. I started within the seasonal team supporting the Greek line, and managed to move to the permanent team, supporting the English-speaking line. My proudest accomplishment was my affinity in cultural awareness which was depicted by my high KPIs in customer satisfaction across the globe.', 'title': 'Global Customer Service Specialist', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 3300787, 'name': 'Evolutionary Archetypes Consulting SL', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C560BAQHy1jrgC_RJ0A/company-logo_400_400/0/1636584812198?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=oW2VewGp916BEOjjqBVJIfX4vM6nGTS4jNPQeVAf1yw', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/evolutionary-archetypes-consulting-sl/', 'employees': {'start': 2, 'end': 10}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Thessaloniki, Greece', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}, 'company': 'Evolutionary Archetypes Consulting SL', 'description': "EA is offering HR (HRS & Recruitment) and web application development services. I joined the team during my MBA-HR. I was responsible for sourcing, interviewing and selecting international candidates for project based roles in the Benelux area, offered by European Organizations. 
I was given the opportunity to work directly with our international partners and facilitated the interview process, ensuring everything goes smoothly. 
Internally, I supported the developer's team with improving an HRM solution that the company offered to clients. I assisted with UE, testing and structured feedback.
